definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: Please remit the payment by telegraphic transfer to our bank account in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 请将货款电汇到我们在香港银行的账户里。

sentences.english: The buyer should pay total amount to seller by T/T within 10 days after receipt of the concerning original B/L.
sentences.chinese: 买方应在收到正本提单后10天内电汇支付全部货款。

sentences.english: We insist on payment in advance, we can’t accept payment after arrival goods.
sentences.chinese: 我们坚持预付货款，不能接受货到付款。

sentences.english: Therefore , The Hong Kong-related enterprises will be paid in arrears or close down .
sentences.chinese: 因此，就会出现相关香港企业拖欠货款或倒闭的情况。

sentences.english: Though the Plaintiff has repeatedly demanded the payment, the Defendant fails to liquidate the outstanding debts in due time.
sentences.chinese: 尽管原告多次催讨货款，被告仍未能清偿到期债务。

sentences.english: Assume that a business estimates that 1 percent of sales on account will be uncollectible.
sentences.chinese: 假设，一个公司估计有1%的赊账销货款将收不回来。

sentences.english: We have received the payment under your arrangment for the goods.
sentences.chinese: 您按排的货款我们已经收到了。

sentences.english: That arrangement allowed Dell'Orco &Villani to receive payment for the machine as they produced it.
sentences.chinese: 这样一来，公司在生产机器的同时可以收到货款。

sentences.english: Tracking your past-due accounts and actively pursuing collections.
sentences.chinese: 追踪你的逾期未付的款项，积极的追回这些货款。

sentences.english: This method is quicker than mail transfer. The seller can receive the money at an early date.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法比信汇快，卖方可以提早收到货款。

sentences.english: After Qian Fei received money, he posted the medicines to Lin Li through post office.
sentences.chinese: 钱菲收到货款后，再通过邮局将药品邮寄给林利。

sentences.english: We can allow you a discount of fifteen percent on condition that you make full payment at sight .
sentences.chinese: 我们可以让八五折，条件是你方即期支付全部货款。

sentences.english: It is understood that the letter of credit covering the abovementioned goods will be established immediately.
sentences.chinese: 不用说，支付上述货款的信用证会立即开立。

sentences.english: Seller agree cancellation with allowance 2% of order value.
sentences.chinese: 卖方同意取消，愿付货款的百分之二作为回扣。

sentences.english: The seller can receive the money at an early date.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法比信汇快，卖方可以提早收到货款。

sentences.english: The international trade payment is the international cargo business loans receipts and disbursements .
sentences.chinese: 国际贸易支付就是国际货物买卖货款的收付。

definition: to pay in full/to pay all of a bill/to pay off
to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to defer payment/to pay back over long term
